title: Gotham-like sans on Charlie Countryman teaser posters
content:
I’ve got another one. The A, M and U seem to be too narrow, so this might be a free font. But I have been wrong before.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803064008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/charlie_countryman_type_4722.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed
